title: Railway controllers to join 24-hour strike tomorrow
body_lines: The Railway Train Controllers' Union (RTCU) today decided to join with the 24-hour countrywide state services trade union action tomorrow, RTCU Secretary Damith Nilusha said.
While issuing a media release the union said they will participate in the strike while shifting no pressure on the commuters. (Chatuanga Samarawickrama)
